channel.title: Apple on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on FinanClub

item.title: Apple Restricts Employee Use of ChatGPT, Wary of Leaks
item.description: Apple Restricts Employee Use of ChatGPT Apple has restricted employee use of ChatGPT, a large language model developed by OpenAI. The restriction is reportedly due to Apple’s concern that employees could use ChatGPT to release confidential data as the company develops its own similar technology.

item.title: An Apple Headset Is Coming. Can It Be More Than a Nerd Helmet?
item.description: Apple is rumored to be releasing a mixed reality headset as a precursor to their AR glasses. Here’s what we know so far: The headset will allow users to switch between viewing the real world and virtual reality with a physical dial.
